alert.note: Alert for Loup Rivers Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 15 at 2:35PM CDT until April 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 209... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM to 8 PM CDT Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 209 Loup Rivers Basin. * TIMING...1 PM CDT until 8 PM CDT Sunday * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 60. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will spread rapidly and will be difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
